page.title: 05MR.WHEELER AND THE MAYPOLE.
page.content: Edward James Wheeler,one of a twin,was born on the 20th of May 1906 at Hardwicke.He moved to Mill farm where he worked and lived,later buying three other farms in Paganhilll,one of which belonged to the Wyatt family. Mr.Wheeler was first associated with the Maypole in 1928 when it was situated on the village green with the well and pump.This was the water supply for the village as there were no sewers or running water.He is now heading a committee of eight members who are re-painting the pole ready for it's new site on a smaller"green". The Maypole Tradition dates back 300 years,Mr.Wheeler has records for the past 250 years.The pole is taken down and painted red, white and blue on special occasions like coronations or Royal weddings.
